snippet.title: Exclusive: Pathankot plotter Masood Azhar missing, on the run

localized.description:
Top sources in Islamabad have told NDTV that the man whom India holds responsible for last month's deadly attack on the air force base in Pathankot, Pakistani terrorist Maulana Masood Azhar, is on the run and may even be hiding in Afghanistan. NDTV has learnt that Mr Sharif has personally thrown his weight behind the need to register a case in the Pathankot terror attack. Who the First Information Report or FIR will name - and whether it will specifically list the Jaish-e-Mohammed as a terror group - is what India is waiting to see.

Watch more videos: http://www.ndtv.com/video?yt

Download the NDTV news app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.july.ndtv&referrer=utm_source%3Dyoutubecards%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dyoutube
